website_summaries.verdict: The latest iteration of the Apple iMac with Retina 5K Display delivers 14.7 million pixels in a very sleek package to your desktop, and it's more affordable than ever.

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: The iMac is better than expected. This is my first one therefore cannot compare, however the only downfall of it is that it has no CD-Rom incorporated.
customer_reviews.author: wo0kie

customer_reviews.title: Hmmm
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as 2015 iMac with 5K display, came as 2013 iMac with Retina display and an upgraded HDD and no mouse. £1000...
customer_reviews.author: Nik F

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic machine. Straight out of the box everything is ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic machine. Straight out of the box everything is perfect and it's up and running within minutes. Has handled everything I throw at it so far! (Prime) delivery was first class and was delivered within the given 1 hour time slot so hats off all round.
customer_reviews.author: The Batman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality at a bargain price. Fast and professional delivery, thank you very muc
customer_reviews.author: andrew lesiw

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant comms and quick delivery. The product is a delight to use. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Jat

customer_reviews.title: Amazing hardware!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing piece of kit. Now I'm no apple fan boy, but their hardware is second to none. Naturally, the first thing to do when you buy an iMac is to install Windows 10, which run great on this system in boot camp mode. The 5k screen is out of this world. A must for all Apple and Windows lovers. I would recommend instantly upgrading to 16GB of memory, as 8GB is just not enough.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Dwyer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: All good. I will only recommend this if Apple pays me. They get enoughd advertising without me helping them.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Bedford

customer_reviews.title: It is as usual an excellent machine, and the 5K is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I renewed my iMac late 2012 for this one. It is as usual an excellent machine, and the 5K is fantastic. However I made one big mistake, my last iMac was a fusion drive 8mb, which was fast, but this time I chose the 16mb without fusion drive. What a difference in speed! It takes much longer to start up and open software. Take note, better to go for 8mb and fusion than 16 and not. That is the reason for 4 stars. Otherwise a doddle to transfer my old backup through time machine and everything works well for my photo editing with the 5K. Still a bit pricy for what is has though.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: The best computer iv used for photo editing.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a photographer by trade and this has made editing and prossing photos easer and faster then on any other computer iv ever used. The picture quality of the screen is crystal clear and useing Light Room it imports, loads and exports them faster then you would believe. Well worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Weylin Archer

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic computer i would recommend it to any one
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic computer i would recommend it to any one, the picture quality is amazing as is the sound and with a 27inc screen is great, one thing you can is have windows 10 running,I know its a lot of money i would recommend it, one other thing apple is always there if you need them.
customer_reviews.author: ron cuthbert
